Title: Big Bang for your Buck!
Cons: The only thing I didn't like about this camera is that when you switch between settings you have to keep going back and taking Flash off Auto...
Pros: I do some professional photography and use this camera when I don't feel like carrying around my SLR.  UNBELIEVABLE images with the obvious limitations of a pocket camera. Love the in camera effects and I printed a 16x24 from a photo my daughter took with this camera!  Great underwater as well!

Title: just happy
Pros: water proof shock proof accident prone girl friend proof ...
Comments:
super service from new egg as always fast hands down best online store ever.
 
Do not ever shop from tristate.com ....

Title: Camera review
Pros: Durable without a doubt. I average 100 pictures a day. I have 5 people using the cameras. We ues them attics, crawlspaces, in pools etc. DURABLE
Comments: The camera takes frequent blurred pictures. It takes practice to pre-focus then shoot and even then it can blur. I have 5 people  using them and we take about 2000 pictures a week. 10 to 60 percent are blurred depending on the camera and user. I love the camera but after 2 years am giving up and going to another brand. PS. We stayed with this brand for business equipment consistency reasons (same battery; learning knowledge; etc.).

Title: Olympus Tough Camera
Cons: Some zoomed in pictures in low light came out a little grainy.
Pros: Love this camera.  It was very durable and a lot of fun to take snorkling while on vacation.  In general, pictures were great.
Comments: I wasn't that concerned with the low light/grainy pictures, it's not like it is a professional $1000 camera.  This is a great point and shoot camera that has the durability we needed.

Cons: not very sharp images, for $300 i expected better images,newegg has limeted replacement only on this so I'm stuck with it
